summary: A couple and their daughter move to Colombia to take over a family manufacturing plant, only to realize their new home is haunted.
cast: Julia Stiles|Scott Speedman|Stephen Rea|Pixie Davies|Vanesa Tamayo|Alejandro Furth|Alvaro García Trujillo|Elkin Díaz|María Fernanda Yepes|Frank Cuervo|Julián Bustamante|Edgar Duran|Beatriz Elena Ángel|Jhoceb Andrés Primo|Vanessa Alexandra Matoma|María Gaviria|Gilberto Ramirez|Maddyson Skentelbery|Guillermo Morales Vitola
title: Out of the Dark
